segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, he's really stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, I'm worried he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing nearby, waiting for him to pass her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl's open palm, she's eagerly anticipating a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy seems determined, he's not noticing the wobbling stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they've done this before, they seem quite coordinated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost within his reach, he's so close.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nervous watching him, I hope he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is looking up at him with such trust, it's sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll manage to get the cookies without the woman noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR
